triples.name: Speech corpus
triples.relevance: The paper proposes the ETAPE corpus, a new speech corpus for evaluating speech-based TV content processing systems.

triples.name: Speech processing
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the evaluation of speech-based TV content processing systems.

triples.name: Speech recognition
triples.relevance: Speech recognition is a core component of speech-based TV content processing that the corpus evaluates.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: NLP techniques are essential for processing and understanding TV content in the speech domain.

triples.name: Corpus linguistics
triples.relevance: The ETAPE corpus is a fundamental linguistic corpus designed for evaluating speech processing systems.
